definition: ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

sentences.english: Only gold seemed to climb in an undramatic fashion to finish the day higher.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有黃金平淡無奇的方式到達更高值的一天。

sentences.english: Where did a no-frills mother of four boys fit?
sentences.chinese: 哪裏適合一個穿着平淡無奇的四個孩子的媽媽住宿呢？

sentences.english: Life is not straightforward, nothing out of the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 生活也是，不要平鋪直敘，平淡無奇。

sentences.english: That may seem a distinctly unromantic prospect.
sentences.chinese: 這看起來是平淡無奇的景色。

sentences.english: At the same time, it’s no ordinary office space.
sentences.chinese: 但與此同時，該公司的辦公場所並非平淡無奇。

sentences.english: But if that is the administration's strategy, it's likely to fall flat.
sentences.chinese: 然而如果這就是政府策略的話，那也太平淡無奇了。

sentences.english: I am on the legislative side and my job is pretty undramatic.
sentences.chinese: 我在立法部門工作，我的工作平淡無奇。

definition: tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
to stand aloof from worldly affairs
to force someone to do something
